aws_redshift_parameter_group.description: Provides a Redshift Cluster parameter group resource.

name.description: The name of the Redshift parameter.

family.description: The family of the Redshift parameter group.

description.description: The description of the Redshift parameter group. Defaults to "Managed by Terraform".

parameter.description: A list of Redshift parameters to apply.

value.description: The value of the Redshift parameter.

tags.description: A mapping of tags to assign to the resource.

arn.description: Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of parameter group
